== Trivia ==

* {{W|Wukro|Weqro}} is a town in {{W|Tigray Region|Tigray, Ethiopia}}. It means '{{W|Rock-cut architecture|rock-cut architecture}}' in {{W|Tigrinya language|Tigrinya}}.
